title: New: Hartheim – Welcome to Hartheim
content:
Opening in a wash of ambient guitar, Welcome to Hartheim, the second single from Manchester’s Hartheim is 3 minutes of hauntingly anthemic pop.

It cuts straight to the heart with chiming guitars and a powerful, though utterly vulnerable vocal performance. It dies away, leaving you with only a minimal guitar line and falsetto to clutch  on to, before its devastatingly emotive climax that sees wretching vocals tower above the guitars crunch.

Listen below:
